_header: I rede that thou be jolly and glad
_description: On the Choice of Friends — nine lines in two stanzas (ababa + cdcd)

                    ys

CULAdd5943.Transcription:
I rede þat þu be ioly & glad& euer more þu a
                    spyeho be to wrong oþer tosadput hym out of þy
                    companye& so þu mist bne myry & gladfor by my truþe
                    an angri manand hym like out a mysho wol do al þat he canto
                    make men angeri as he ys
